snippet: The federal Department of Education is investigating whether Florida State properly responded to a student’s sexual assault allegation against Winston, the 2013 Heisman Trophy winner.
abstract: Education Dept is investigating whether Florida State properly responded to a student’s allegation that she had been sexually assaulted by star quarterback and Heisman Trophy winner Jameis Winston; inquiry is response to a complaint that Winston’s accuser filed in March with the civil rights office.
lead_paragraph: The federal Department of Education is investigating whether Florida State properly responded to a student’s sexual assault allegation against Winston, the 2013 Heisman Trophy winner.

headline.main: Inquiry to Revisit Jameis Winston Case on Civil Rights Grounds
headline.print_headline: Winston Case Is Revisited on Civil Rights Grounds
